info.coldsnaphorde.holiday: Happy Holidays! All entities now have a low chance to drop presents, and horde members have a higher chance of dropping presents!
message.coldsnaphorde.hordevictory: The Cold Snap Horde was defeated!
message.coldsnaphorde.hordedefeat: Those who challenged the Cold Snap Horde were unsuccessful in their efforts.
itemtooltip.present.1: Right click to open for a surprise!
itemtooltip.present.2: Obtained by killing horde members during the horde event.
itemtooltip.present.3: See the Snow Globe for more details!
itemtooltip.present.special: Holiday Special! Low chance to drop from any mob!
itemtooltip.snowglobe.1: Shake to start the Cold Snap Horde event!
itemtooltip.snowglobe.2: Horde members killed from the event may drop presents!
itemtooltip.snowglobe.3: WARNING! This is can be a difficult event!
itemtooltip.snowglobe.4: Recommended to have a defensible area and gear before starting!
itemtooltip.tophat.1: Disguises you as a horde member, good for stray members.
itemtooltip.tophat.2: Will not protect you from members from the horde event!
message.coldsnaphorde.peaceful: The horde melts around the challengers, as peaceful mode was enabled.
message.coldsnaphorde.confused: The horde is confused by the challengers surroundings, and decides to leave.
